title: WA Robot Events Response
description: Schema for the data field when calling 'wa robot events'. Returns recent detected events and optional workflow previews.

events.description: Recent events ordered by detection time (newest first)

pane_filter.description: If set, events were filtered to this pane_id

rule_id_filter.description: If set, events were filtered to this rule_id

event_type_filter.description: If set, events were filtered to this event_type

unhandled_only.description: If true, only unhandled events were returned

since_filter.description: If set, events were filtered to those detected after this timestamp (ms)

would_handle.description: If true, per-event workflow previews are included

dry_run.description: If true, this was a dry-run preview (no workflows executed)

event.description: A detected event from pattern matching

pane_id.description: Pane where the event was detected

agent_type.description: Type of agent detected in the pane

extracted.description: Values extracted from the matched pattern (e.g., percentage, token counts)

matched_text.description: The text that matched the pattern (may be redacted)

captured_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the event was detected

handled_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the event was handled (null if unhandled)

workflow_id.description: ID of the workflow execution that handled this event

would_handle_with.description: Preview of the workflow that would handle this event (if requested)

preview_command.description: Preview command to run this workflow

first_step.description: First step name in the workflow

would_run.description: Whether this workflow would auto-run given current config/state

reason.description: Reason the workflow would not run (if applicable)
